title: 81/904/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 October 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Digilab FTS-IR spectrometer, model FTS-20' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 October 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Digilab FTS-IR spectrometer, model FTS-20" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/904/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Digilab FTS-IR spectrometer, model FTS-20" which is subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 14 April 1981 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 October 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
